plot: A boss decide to bring a Ferrari to a footballer and meet on the trip an ex-employee he fired few months ago. Since the boss get stopped by the police because he drove to fast, they have got no choice except to help each other.
title: Une Ferrari pour deux
plot_es: A boss decide to bring a Ferrari to a footballer and meet on the trip an ex-employee he fired few months ago. Since the boss get stopped by the police because he drove to fast, they have got no choice except to help each other.
plot_en: A boss decide to bring a Ferrari to a footballer and meet on the trip an ex-employee he fired few months ago. Since the boss get stopped by the police because he drove to fast, they have got no choice except to help each other.
